description: Yes, you can use your own songs. But make sure you use an mp3 or wav file format. To add your own music, hit the button to 'Change Music'. You will be redirected to the audio library where you can see a button to 'Upload'. Click on it, browse the audio from your device and upload it. However, make sure that you have the right to use the music, i.e., the music should either be a licensed copy or a free version.
description_text: Yes, you can use your own songs. But make sure you use an mp3 or wav file format. To add your own music, hit the button to 'Change Music'. However, make sure that you have the right to use the music, i.e., the music should either be a licensed copy or a free version.
title: Can I upload my own music to use in my video?
